title: Go Language For Database Administration
summary: Go has a number of benefits that make it a good choice for DBAs. It is easy to learn and read, and it has built-in support for concurrency. Go has good support for big data. It makes it easy to distribute data across multiple machines, as well as scale up to more powerful systems if necessary. Go also makes it easier to access web services. It has built in support for JSON parsing and using HTTP endpoints, which are both important for modern web apps.
